articles.author: Erika Edwards
articles.title: As winter virus activity picks up, CDC warns of 'urgent need' to boost vaccine coverage - NBC News
articles.description: Not enough Americans are being vaccinated against Covid, the flu and RSV to stem rising numbers of the respiratory illnesses, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention said Thursday.
articles.content:
Not enough Americans are being vaccinated against Covid, the flu and RSV to stem rising numbers of the respiratory illnesses, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention said Thursday.
